definitions: Any of a class of fragrant organic compounds, naturally occurring in essential oils such as rose oil, and used in perfumery and as flavorings.
A chemical compound that is a component of the scent of raspberries and is also used as a food additive.
examples: The perfume contained a high concentration of ionone.
Ionone is responsible for the characteristic aroma of violets.
The chemist synthesized ionone in the laboratory.
